main event: An airman observed a round, white object in the sky, resembling the size of a bright star, traveling rapidly and disappearing in just three seconds.
interesting points: The object was seen at night,The sighting lasted for only 3 seconds,The airman was a reliable witness from the 28th Air Police Squadron,Factors such as weather conditions were noted to be clear at the time of the sighting,The sighting may have been a balloon or meteor according to the conclusions drawn.
sighted object: a round white object the size of a bright star
witness description: Airman Second Class, 28th Air Police Squadron, Air Policeman, Reliable
